name: Bua's Escape Elephant Adventure
description:
Play as Bua the baby elephant and follow her adventure.
Bua lives in the forests of Thailand with her friends and family.
In this free demo of the upcoming full game, you have to help Bua collect all the bananas in the forest, avoid the traps, dodge the snakes, hide from the hunters and get home to her mum.
This free demo is advert free.🐘❤🍌
Follow Bua on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Buasescape/
Get Bua's full rhyming story ebook on Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07T4HF2T...

Sign up for updates at:
https://phonzogames.co.uk/
